long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insights for Podio is a tool that provides the user both a high level and granular view of the workspace/apps structure and metadata of their Podio platform. It offers a Podio workspace overview including, health/issues of the workspace/apps, and provides the user a thorough system insight.
